mapper.insert: insert into sort (id, name, is_suit, first_sortid, second_sortid, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSuit,jdbcType=BIT}, #{firstSortid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{secondSortid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update sort set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_suit = #{isSuit,jdbcType=BIT}, first_sortid = #{firstSortid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, second_sortid = #{secondSortid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, is_suit, first_sortid, second_sortid, create_time, update_time from sort
